data.title: Wintringham Community Hall
data.meta_description: Community and village hall of Wintringham, near Malton, North Yorkshire. The perfect setting for your wedding or other event.
data.text:
Details

Published: 28 October 2023

WINTRINGHAM CHRISTMAS FAIR

In aid of the Brain Tumour Charity

and St. Peter's Church, Wintringham

Sunday 26th November

10 am to 3pm

Santa, gifts, crafts, food and drink.

Details

Published: 28 October 2023

WINTRINGHAM COMMUNITY HALL COMMITTEE

THE ANNUAL GENERAL MEETING FOR THE ABOVE COMMITTEE WILL TAKE PLACE

ON

THURSDAY 9TH NOVEMBER 2023

AT

8PM

IN THE CHRIS YATES MEETING ROOM

If you would like to attend please email This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.

to let us know.

Details

Published: 17 October 2022

WINTRINGHAM COMMUNITY HALL COMMITTEE

ANNUAL GENERAL MEETING

THURSDAY 10th NOVEMBER

8PM

WILL BE HELD IN THE CHRIS YATES MEETING ROOM.

Details

Published: 10 February 2022

On Friday 17th June 2022 Fire Safety Training will be available

from

9 am to 12 noon

and will cover the following:

Why we have Fire Safety

The Fire Triangle

Fire Safety Risk Assessment

In an Emergency and the correct procedure

Fire Safety Control Measures

Fire Fighting Equipment

Practical Extinguisher Training

The cost is £50 plus VAT per person and bookings can be made directly with Landbased Training on 01944 758379 or via emailThis email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.

Details

Published: 20 July 2019

STAY AND PLAY TODDLER GROUP

EVERY FRIDAY MORNING (INCLUDING SCHOOL HOLIDAYS)

10 AM - 12 NOON

£2/FAMILY

Come and join the fun at our baby and toddler group with lots of toys to keep your little ones entertained. Feel free to join in or sit back and enjoy a cuppa and catch up with other parents are guardians.

For more information please contact Rachel on 07746200521

Details

Published: 16 February 2017

Short mat bowls is available at the hall and meet regularly every Tuesday from 7pm.

Come and give it a try. Beginners welcome. All equipment and bowls provided if required.

Soft shoes or thick socks required on the mats.

£3 to include cup of tea or coffee

Details

Published: 17 September 2016

Friday Night Social Evening.

Next event Friday 5th October

Why not come along?

Friendly relaxed atmosphere.

Bring your own wine or beer.

£3 to include nibbles.
